title: DDLJ Completes 24 Years Of Release, SRK-Gauri Hosts A Private Bash And More From Ent
text:
According to reports, SRK and wife Gauri Khan hosted an intimate get-together at their Alibaug bungalow on Friday. Earlier in the day, Shah Rukh and Gauri were spotted with their younger son AbRam as they jetted off in a boat to Alibaug. Avoiding paps, SRK was seen hiding his face using his hoodie as he held hand of his youngest son.

2. Kajol Recreates Her Iconic DDLJ Train Pose As DDLJ Completes 24 Years Of Release!
